club.name: GITAM Aero Astro Club
club.description: A passionate community of curious individuals dedicated to exploring, learning, and building exciting projects in the fields of Robotics, Programming, and Astronomy.

timeline.title: Foundation Year
timeline.description: GITAM Aero Astro Club was founded by VVS Basanth Pedapati with a vision to create an interdisciplinary platform for aerospace, robotics, and astronomy enthusiasts.
achievements: Club establishment and initial team formation

timeline.title: Building Foundations
timeline.description: Expanded our technical capabilities and hosted our first major events. Established core teams for robotics and programming.

timeline.title: Technological Advancement
timeline.description: Year of innovation and project development. Started working on advanced robotics projects and computational astronomy tools.
achievements: First Solid propellant Rocket prototype called RAVEN by Team Raptor
Participated in the Inter-college Robotics competition

timeline.title: Research & Recognition
timeline.description: Focused on research projects and gained recognition at national level competitions. Expanded into space technology research.
achievements: Participated in IIT Mandi national wide hackathon

timeline.title: Growth & Collaboration
timeline.description: Significant expansion in membership and project scope. Established collaborations with other institutions and industry partners.
achievements: Participated in IIT Kanpur national wide Tech Fest

timeline.title: Innovation Excellence
timeline.description: Current year focused on cutting-edge projects, leadership development, and establishing GAAC as a premier technical club.
achievements: Took part in IIT Kharagpur national wide hackathon

founder.name: VVS Basanth Pedapati
founder.title: Founder & Mentor
founder.bio: Established GAAC to cultivate interdisciplinary technological innovation, mentorship, and real-world engineering experience for students.

executives.name: Sampath Varma Datla
executives.bio: Leading the club with a passion for space exploration and team building. Specializes in mission planning and organizational development.

executives.name: Dil Barash Mohammad
executives.bio: Organizing impactful events and workshops that inspire the next generation of aerospace engineers and researchers.

executives.name: Narayana Gupta
executives.bio: Overseeing technical projects with expertise in robotics and propulsion systems. Passionate about sustainable aerospace technologies.
achievements: Second Place in IIT Madras Robo Soccer competition with a custom-built Wi-Fi controlled Robo Car

executives.name: B Raagni Moulika
executives.bio: Managing communications and documentation with a focus on astrophysics research and outreach programs.
achievements: Excellence in Financial Documentation & Budget Management
Streamlined club communication systems and member onboarding

teamLeads.name: Prasanna RDL
teamLeads.bio: Leading the core team operations including content writing, graphic design, photography, and club operations.

teamLeads.name: Lanka Geetha Koumudi
teamLeads.bio: Leading the StarGazers team in exploring the cosmos through observations, astrophotography, space research, and rocketry projects.

teamLeads.name: T Kamal Shushank
teamLeads.bio: Leading the Programming team in building software solutions, web applications, and AI/ML models for club projects.

teams.name: StarGazers (Astronomy, Space and Rocketry)
teams.description: Exploring the cosmos through observations, astrophotography, space research, and rocketry projects

teams.name: Robusta (Robotics & Automation)
teams.description: Designing, building, and programming robots for competitions and real-world applications

teams.name: Programmers (Coding & Development)
teams.description: Building software solutions, web applications, and AI/ML models for club projects

teams.name: Core Team
teams.description: Content writing, graphic design, photography, and club operations
